Author: yubrew
Content: iinnovate.blogspot.com is pretty decent.  I really like the one w/ Eric Schmidt.

Author: ivankirigin
Content: Pencil and paper are a clear solution. But that doesn't involve wasting a great deal of money and promising control. Lots of folks are pretty paranoid about fixed elections. I try not to attribute something to malice which could easily be incompetence.\nhttp://en.wikiquote.org/wiki/Robert_J._Hanlon

Author: iamwil
Title: 10 automakers to jointly develop OS : National : DAILY YOMIURI ONLINE (The Daily Yomiuri)

Author: ivankirigin
Content: Yah, it all seems pretty paranoid. Talk of Facebook being a "walled-garden" really doesn't compare to what we have to deal with on mobile platforms. I heard on the radio someone mention the days of "phone rental", where there were the exact same concerns you hear today about security and control. But then it was monolithic AT&T saying only the three models of phones it designed could possibly be safe to use. Ridiculous.

Author: tomek
Content: More integration between desktop and web environments. Eventually becoming a one inseparable instance.
